turns.en: Challenge 1: Customer says, “I only use Wi‑Fi at home. Do I still need a big data plan?” Respond in one sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 1：客戶說「我在家都用 Wi‑Fi，還需要大流量嗎？」請用一句話回答。

turns.hint_en: If you’re mostly on Wi‑Fi, a mid‑data plan with throttling after the cap is usually enough.
turns.hint_zh: 如果你大多用 Wi‑Fi，中等流量加上超量後降速的方案通常就夠用。

turns.en: Challenge 2: “My bill went up—why?” One‑sentence reply.
turns.zh: 挑戰 2：「我帳單變貴了，為什麼？」一句話回覆。

turns.hint_en: It’s often due to extra data usage or add‑on services, and I can check the details for you right now.
turns.hint_zh: 通常是因為超出流量或加購服務，我可以立刻幫你查明細。

turns.en: Challenge 3: “I’m traveling next week—how do I avoid expensive roaming?” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 3：「我下週出國，怎麼避免漫遊很貴？」一句話。

turns.hint_en: You can buy a short‑term roaming pack before you leave and turn on data roaming only for that period.
turns.hint_zh: 你可以出國前買短期漫遊包，並只在那段期間開啟數據漫遊。

turns.en: Challenge 4: “My speed suddenly got slow.” One sentence, reassure and offer a check.
turns.zh: 挑戰 4：「我網速突然變慢。」一句話，先安撫再表示可查。

turns.hint_en: It may be throttling after heavy usage, so let me check your data status and see the best fix.
turns.hint_zh: 可能是用量大後被降速，我幫你查目前用量並找最好的解法。

turns.en: Challenge 5: “Can I share data with my family?” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 5：「可以跟家人共享流量嗎？」一句話。

turns.hint_en: Yes—family plans can share a data pool across multiple lines, and we can pick one based on your total usage.
turns.hint_zh: 可以，家庭方案能多門號共享流量池，我們可依總用量選最適合的。

turns.en: Challenge 6: “I don’t want any hidden fees.” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 6：「我不想有隱藏費用。」一句話。

turns.hint_en: I’ll show you the full monthly breakdown—including taxes and possible add‑ons—before you sign up.
turns.hint_zh: 我會在辦理前把每月完整費用明細（含稅與可能加購）清楚列給你。

turns.en: Challenge 7: “I want eSIM today.” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 7：「我今天就要 eSIM。」一句話。

turns.hint_en: Sure—if your phone supports eSIM, we can activate it in minutes after quick ID verification.
turns.hint_zh: 可以，只要你的手機支援 eSIM，完成身分驗證後幾分鐘內就能開通。

turns.en: Challenge 8: “What plan do you recommend for 30GB a month?” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 8：「我每月 30GB，你推薦什麼？」一句話。

turns.hint_en: A 30–50GB plan with throttling after the cap is a good balance of cost and flexibility for your usage.
turns.hint_zh: 以你每月 30GB，30～50GB 且超量後降速的方案在價格與彈性上最平衡。

turns.en: Challenge 9: “Can I set alerts so I don’t go over?” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 9：「我能設定提醒避免超量嗎？」一句話。

turns.hint_en: Yes, you can set data alerts in the app, and I can help you configure them now.
turns.hint_zh: 可以，你能在 App 設定流量提醒，我現在就能幫你設定好。

turns.en: Challenge 10: “I need hotspot for work.” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 10：「我工作需要分享網路。」一句話。

turns.hint_en: No problem—choose a plan that allows hotspot, and we’ll confirm any speed limits or fair‑use rules.
turns.hint_zh: 沒問題，選擇可分享網路的方案，我們也會確認是否有限速或公平使用規則。

turns.en: Challenge 11: “I want to keep my number.” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 11：「我想保留原門號。」一句話。

turns.hint_en: We can port your number to the new plan, and activation usually completes quickly once verified.
turns.hint_zh: 我們可以幫你攜碼到新方案，驗證完成後通常很快就能開通。

turns.en: Challenge 12: “Which is better—unlimited or capped?” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 12：「不限量跟有上限哪個好？」一句話。

turns.hint_en: Unlimited is worry‑free, while capped is cheaper—so it depends on whether you value stability or cost most.
turns.hint_zh: 不限量最省心，有上限通常較便宜，就看你更重視穩定還是價格。

turns.en: Challenge 13: “Can I switch plans later?” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 13：「之後可以換方案嗎？」一句話。

turns.hint_en: Yes, you can usually change plans, and I’ll suggest one with flexible upgrade options if your usage grows.
turns.hint_zh: 可以，多數方案可更換，我也會建議你選擇升級彈性大的方案以防用量增加。

turns.en: Challenge 14: “I’m paying too much.” One sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰 14：「我付太多了。」一句話。

turns.hint_en: Let’s review your actual usage and match you to a cheaper plan that still covers your needs.
turns.hint_zh: 我們先看你的實際用量，再配到更便宜但仍足夠的方案。

turns.en: Challenge 15: “Okay, let’s do it.” One sentence to confirm next steps.
turns.zh: 挑戰 15：「好，那就辦吧。」一句話確認下一步。

turns.hint_en: Great—please bring your ID, and I’ll set up the plan, activate your SIM/eSIM, and test your data before you leave.
turns.hint_zh: 太好了，請帶證件，我會幫你辦好、開通 SIM/eSIM，並在你離開前測試上網。
